miniapp.name: Rocket Shooter
miniapp.subtitle: Epic Space Battle Game
miniapp.description: Action-packed space shooter with blockchain leaderboard on Base Mainnet. Destroy enemy rockets and planes, avoid birds, save your high scores on-chain!
miniapp.tagline: Defend the skies, dominate the leaderboard!
miniapp.ogTitle: Rocket Shooter - Epic Space Battle on Base
miniapp.ogDescription: Action-packed space shooter with blockchain scores. Destroy enemies, avoid birds, climb the leaderboard on Base Mainnet!
